data.convo: Lucy , come here ! I can see the lake which is in the center of park . It is beautiful ! Look , there are so many birds around it . It is a great place for a relaxing vacation . Listen to the sound of nature ! It's like music . Yeah , I agree . It makes you feel really good . What are those ? Do you mean the red things ? They are roses . I'm going to take more pictures today . Me , too .
